pullrequest.title: added joint_command_gui tool - not sure where it should live

content.raw:
Awesome Maurice, thanks. :)
One problem though: the script has a ROS dependency so it should probably go into the ros directory, maybe ros/atlas_msgs. Currently the script is also trying to load the manifest of a package that doesn't exist.
content.html: Awesome Maurice, thanks. :) One problem though: the script has a ROS dependency so it should probably go into the ros directory, maybe ros/atlas_msgs. Currently the script is also trying to load the manifest of a package that doesn't exist.
